article.title: Adventium to Develop Virtual Cyber Defender
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Adventium Enterprise Limited Liability Company, Minneapolis, Minnesota, was awarded a nearly $24 million contract to develop a trusted virtual cyber defender that meets the technical, logistic, and economic constraints presented by the U.S. Air Force computing infrastructure. Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity.
